thread.title_full: Are Gauahar Khan and Kushal Tandon back together? See photo to decide | tv | Hindustan Times

title: Are Gauahar Khan and Kushal Tandon back together? See photo to decide | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Are Gauahar Khan and Kushal Tandon back together? See photo to decide tv Updated: Feb 13, 2017 15:50 IST HT Correspondent Hindustan Times, New Delhi It seems the former lovers haven’t quite gotten over each other. At least their latest gushing exchange on social media, admiring each other suggests so. (YouTube grab) 
What’s cooking between actor Kushal Tandon and his model-turned-actor ex-girlfriend Gauahar Khan? 
It seems the former lovers haven’t quite gotten over each other. At least their latest gushing exchange on social media, admiring each other suggests so. Read more Jennifer Winget thanks Kushal Tandon for saving her. Here’s what she said 
It started when one of Gauahar’s recent magazine cover photo caught Kushal’s attention and he couldn’t stop himself from sharing it on Instagram, complete with a short and sweet post complimenting her. Check it out below: A photo posted by Kushal Tandon (@therealkushaltandon) on Feb 12, 2017 at 10:13am PST 
Within hours, Gauahar thanked him for his sweet gesture by posting the same magazine cover, with the caption, “I l ve this pic !!! ?? @haiderkhanhaider youve always captured me amazingly.... Thank you!!!! N thank you @therealkushaltandon for not just posting this pic but for the kind words !!! You shine on !!!!?#gratitude @stardustmagz.” The former Big Boss contestants have become good friends again and are often seen interacting on social media. (YouTube grab) 
Bigg Boss winner Gauahar Khan and former contestant Kushal became one of TV’s most-loved couples during their stint on the reality show. But things didn’t work out between the two post the show, and they ended their one-year relationship on a sour note. They even had an epic war of words on social media, after Kushal allegedly spoke about Gauahar to a publication, which irked her. 
Although the two made it clear they are never getting back together, they have become good friends again and are often seen interacting on social media. A photo posted by Beyhadh 1st FC 24.3K family (@official_beyhadh) on Feb 12, 2017 at 11:25pm PST 
Recently, Kushal, who is currently seen as Arjun on Sony Entertainment Television’s Beyhadh, was also in news for saving co-actor Jennifer Winget’s life when the set of their TV show caught fire. With all this, it seems that Kushal is quite a ladies man. 
Follow @htshowbiz for more
